meta.name: VBM
meta.description: This algorithm runs Voxel Based Morphometry on structural T1 weighted MRI scans(BIDS format) using SPMv12 standalone and MATLAB Runtimev713. Each scan takes approximately 10 mins to run on a system with 2.3 GHz,i5 equivalent processor, 8GB RAM. Each scan output directory takes about 150MB space after running this algorithm. Please make sure to have the space and resources to run this algorithm accordingly.
